Original:
這一天提早過生日，來到拍攝「華燈初上」的條通裡，好友找到的餐酒館－From A，工作奔波完後的紓壓時間，顯得特別珍貴！
一下班就抵達，我們是當天開始營業的第一組客人，所以可以好好拍整間店的全貌，感覺很不錯～

Haru
酒莊：Casa Rojo
葡萄品種： Shiraz/Syrah， Monastrell， Garnacha
產區：Spain／Jumilla
酒精含量：13%
西班牙粉紅酒，瓶口是蠟封滿特別的，這支酒偏果香，有草莓、覆盆子、帶點梅子味，是清爽風味的葡萄酒，喜歡果香微酸的朋友可以試試看喔！

蒜香培根辣椒麵
推薦給喜歡吃辣的朋友，這一道辣椒麵搭配粉紅葡萄酒滿適合的，辣度與酸度調和後，在口中會有點中和，配酒很可以！

奶油松露野菇燉飯
燉飯的口感是我喜歡的，然後滿滿的野菇和味道濃郁的松露，推薦給愛好菇味的你～

青醬雞肉烤餅組
如果只是喝酒想點食物搭配，這一道我很推薦！雞胸肉是廚房自己做的，尤其是它冷掉都好吃，這點很難得！

特調
調酒師以這間店House的白酒做基底，做的像西班牙的Sangria一樣有果香，裡面加了茉莉花的香氣、檸檬和柑橘，再一點點水蜜桃，白酒酒體本身偏清爽，
有加氣泡變得更稀釋，為了讓酒體更扎實一點，加入伏特加，最後加入通寧水，最後有點像Gin tonic；我們好喜歡這杯調酒！！

座位分成吧台區、兩個沙發區，還有獨立卡拉ＯＫ包廂（低消$8000，包廂可容8-10位，建議提早預訂，另收服務費10%）

在 From A 真得很自在！ 無論是服務、空間、食物和各類酒都讓人很喜歡，一個人、兩個人或三五好友一起來都可以找到自己喜歡的酒喔！紅白葡萄酒直接開一瓶也很可以喔！
EN:
On this day early, I came to shoot the "Huayan Chu Two". The restaurant and tavern found by my friends, the relief time of the pressure after the work was finished, seemed very precious!
Arrive after the class. We are the first group of guests that start to open that day, so we can take the whole picture of the whole store. It feels very good ~

Haru
Winery: Casa Rojo
Grape variet
Production area: spain / jumilla
Alcohol content: 13%
Spanish pink wine, the bottle mouth is full of wax. This wine is fragrant, with strawberries, raspberries, and a little plum flavor. It is a refreshing flavor. Friends who like slightly sour fruit can try it!

Garlic bacon pepper noodles
Recommended to friends who like spicy food. This pepper noodles are suitable for pink wines. After blending spicyness and acidity, it will be a bit neutral in the mouth.

Stewed rice mushroom stewed rice
The taste of stewed rice is my favorite, and then the full wild mushrooms and the rich flavor of truffle are recommended for you who love mushroom flavors ~

Green sauce chicken barbecue group
If you just drink food and want to order food, I recommend this!Chicken breasts are made by the kitchen by themselves, especially it is delicious when it is cold, which is rare!

Special adjustment
The bartender uses this store House's liquor as the base. It has a fruity aroma like Sangria in Spain. It adds jasmine's aroma, lemon and citrus, and a little bit of peach. The white wine is quite refreshing.
The foaming foam has become more diluted. In order to make the wine body more solid, add vodka, and finally add Tongning water. Finally, it is a bit like Gin Tonic; we like this cup of bartender!Intersection

The seats are divided into bar areas, two sofa areas, and independent Kara OK box (low-elimination $ 8000, the box can be 8-10 bits, it is recommended to book early, and the service fee is 10%)

It's really comfortable in from a!Whether it is service, space, food, and various wines, people like it. One person, two or three or five friends can find their favorite wine together!It is also possible to open a bottle of red and white wine directly!

Original:
一間很有氛圍的餐酒館!!
酒的價格不貴~而且很好喝~適合小酌、姊妹聊心事的好地方!!

餐點不同於一般紅酒店，沒想到烤餅、和牛肉燥飯、泰式打拋諸、和有和風的明太子烏龍麵通通超好吃!

讓人會想要一來再來的地方
EN:
A very atmospheric restaurant !!
The price of wine is not expensive ~ and it's delicious ~ Suitable for a good place for drinking and sisters to talk about things !!

Different meals are different from ordinary red hotels. I did not expect that roasted cakes, dried beef rice, Thai -style touched, and harmonious Ming Prince Oolong noodles are super delicious!

People will want to come back again

Original:
這家清酒吧給我留下了深刻的印象！能夠以實惠的價格品嚐到各種嚴選的日本酒，這一點我很喜歡。清酒和純米清酒品種多樣，品質優良。另外，調酒師非常專業，給我如何選擇酒的建議。您可以找到適合您口味的清酒。

在這裡您還有機會嘗試有趣的飛鏢遊戲。他們的飛鏢設備現代、準確且價格合理。您可以與朋友一起挑戰飛鏢技巧，分享充滿歡笑和競爭的時光。像這樣的互動遊戲增添了夜晚的樂趣。

總的來說，這家清酒吧給我提供了一個有趣的氛圍。我們提供多種酒類選擇和合理的價格、多種娛樂選擇、舒適的環境和友好的員工。在這裡，您不僅可以品嚐美味的清酒，還可以進行有趣的互動。我強烈推薦給任何尋找清酒和娛樂的人。您一定會有一次美好的體驗！
EN:
This sake bar impressed me!I like to taste a variety of strictly selected Japanese wine at a beneficial price. I like this very much.Sake and pure rice sake variety and excellent quality.In addition, the bartender is very professional and give me how to choose wine.You can find sake that suits your taste.

Here you still have the opportunity to try interesting dart games.Their dart equipment is modern, accurate and reasonable.You can challenge the darts with your friends and share the time full of laughter and competition.Interactive games like this add the fun of night.

Overall, this sake bar provides me with an interesting atmosphere.We provide a variety of alcohol choices and reasonable prices, multiple entertainment choices, comfortable environment and friendly employees.Here, you can not only taste delicious sake, but also make interesting interactions.I strongly recommend to anyone who is looking for sake and entertainment.You will definitely have a beautiful experience!
